about.details:
SP Refractories Ltd manufactures and supplies refactory material made using hydrated lime, Calcined Alumina, and other raw materials. Refractory cement is its core focus that is widely used in steel & construction industries because of high thermal conductivity, maximum strength, and heat resistance. The company purchases clinkers from outsiders and thereafter crushes, blend, and pack refractory cement in powder form in its manufacturing facility.

Its manufacturing facility are situated in Hingna, Nagpur. The business has a total clinkers manufacturing capacity of 4000 MT per year and clinkers crushing capacity of 6000 MT per year.

Competitive strengths

  • Experienced promoters and management team with successful track record.
  • Long standing relationship with customers and suppliers.
  • Strong balance sheet and financial track record.
  • Strategically located manufacturing facility in Nagpur.

faqs.question: What is the SP Refractories IPO?
faqs.answer:
SP Refractories IPO is a SME IPO of 547200 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹4.92 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹90 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on March 9, 2022, and closes on March 11, 2022.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in SP Refractories IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in SP Refractories IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in SP Refractories IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in SP Refractories IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'SP Refractories IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When SP Refractories IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The SP Refractories IPO opens on March 9, 2022 and closes on March 11, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of SP Refractories IPO?
faqs.answer: SP Refractories IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,44,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for SP Refractories IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in SP Refractories IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is SP Refractories IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for SP Refractories IPO will be done on Wednesday, March 16, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, March 21, 2022. Check the SP Refractories IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is SP Refractories IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The SP Refractories IPO listing date is on Tuesday, March 22, 2022.
